kubernetes_api_service.description: An API Service is an abstraction which defines for locating and communicating with servers.

metadata.description: Standard API service's metadata. For more info see [Kubernetes reference](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#metadata)

spec.description: Spec contains information for locating and communicating with a server. [Kubernetes reference](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#spec-and-status)
